mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pickupman (PM_NAME, PM_TEL, PM_REGION, PM_PROFILE) VALUES (#{pmName}, #{pmTel}, #{pmRegion}, #{pmProfile})
mapper.select: select pm_name as pmName, pm_tel as pmTel, pm_status as pmStatus, pm_region as pmRegion, pm_profile as pmProfile from pickupman order by pm_no limit #{row}, 10
